name: capacitor production, electrolyte type, < 2cm height | capacitor, electrolyte type, < 2cm height | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9403/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of small (i.e. hight below 2 cm) electrolyt capacitors. It is based on the assumption that a typical small electrolyt capacitor has an average weight of 1.29 g. The data represent a typical small electrolyt-capacitor used in the information and communication technology. Material data are taken from datasheets of producers of such capacitors and from the literature. Infrastructure and production efforts are based on own assumptions. The production efforts represent not a specific capacitor type and have thus, accordingly higher uncertainties.

From reception of metals and plastics at the factory gate.

This dataset includes raw material input and production efforts for the production of currently used small (< 2 cm) electrolyt-capacitors.
category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represent a global valuable composition of small electrolyt-capacitors.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: average production composed of: formulation; build-up process; cutting; bisquing; Pre-Firing; Firing; Tumbling; Termination (SMT) resp. metallization; slitting; winding; metal spray; heat treatment; sawing; lead welding; epoxy filling (THT)

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=GLO
Electolyte capacitors are mainly out of aluminium, they are notable for their high capacitance per unit of volume (CV product) and excellent current handling capability. Therefore they are essential components in frequency converters, as DC link in traction, in electronic lamp ballasts, automotive and studio flash applications. The small electolyte capacitors have hight below 2 cm.

flow.name: capacitor, electrolyte type, < 2cm height
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=RER
Calculated Value. The production of 1 kg of capacitors lead to a waste amount of 0.48 kg unused raw materials. Hence, this dataset here has an input of 1.48 kg of raw materials per kg of capacitor. The split to the different raw materials (metals, plastics, etc.) is based on the reported  material specifications.

Further references
ZVEI (2006) Umbrella Specs. Download of December 21 from <http://www.zvei.org/index.php?id=1158>.
